mapper.insert: insert into codeworld_order ( t_order_id, t_order_total_pay, t_order_member_id, t_order_address_id, t_order_buyer_name, t_order_create_time, t_order_product_count ) values ( #{id}, #{totalPay}, #{memberId}, #{addressId}, #{buyerName}, #{createTime}, #{orderProductCount} )
mapper.select: select distinct co.t_order_id AS id, co.t_order_total_pay AS totalPay from codeworld_order AS co left join codeworld_order_detail AS cod on co.t_order_id = cod.t_order_id left join codeworld_order_status AS cos on cod.t_order_detail_id = cos.t_order_id where co.t_order_id = #{orderId} and cos.t_order_status = 1

select cod.t_order_detail_id AS orderDetailId, co.t_order_member_id AS memberId, co.t_order_address_id AS addressId, co.t_order_buyer_name AS buyerName, cod.t_order_delivery_company AS orderDeliveryCompany, cod.t_order_delivery_number AS orderDeliveryNumber, cos.t_order_status AS orderStatus, cos.t_order_create_time AS createTime, cos.t_order_pay_time AS payTime, cos.t_order_consign_time AS consignTime, cos.t_order_end_time AS endTime, cos.t_order_close_time AS closeTime, coe.t_order_evaluation_time AS evaluationTime, cor.t_return_order_apply_time AS orderReturnApplyTime, cor.t_return_handle_time AS orderReturnHandleTime, cor.t_return_order_status AS orderReturnStatus from codeworld_order_detail AS cod left join codeworld_order AS co on cod.t_order_id = co.t_order_id left join codeworld_order_status AS cos on cod.t_order_detail_id = cos.t_order_id left join codeworld_order_evaluation AS coe on cod.t_order_detail_id = coe.t_order_detail_id left join codeworld_order_return AS cor on cod.t_order_detail_id = cor.t_order_id where cod.t_order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId}

select cos.t_order_status AS orderStatus, count(co.t_order_id) AS orderCount from codeworld_order AS co left join codeworld_order_detail AS cod on co.t_order_id = cod.t_order_id left join codeworld_order_status AS cos on cod.t_order_detail_id = cos.t_order_id where cos.t_order_status != 7 and co.t_order_member_id = #{memberId} group by cos.t_order_status

select cod.t_order_detail_id AS orderId, co.t_order_total_pay AS totalPay, co.t_order_actual_pay AS actualPay, co.t_order_buyer_name AS buyerName, co.t_order_create_time AS createTime, cod.t_order_delivery_company AS orderDeliveryCompany, cod.t_order_delivery_sn AS orderDeliverySn, cod.t_order_delivery_number AS orderDeliveryNumber, cos.t_order_status AS orderStatus, cos.t_order_pay_time AS payTime, cos.t_order_consign_time AS consignTime, cos.t_order_end_time AS endTime, cos.t_order_close_time AS closeTime from codeworld_order AS co left join codeworld_order_detail AS cod on co.t_order_id = cod.t_order_id left join codeworld_order_status AS cos on cod.t_order_detail_id = cos.t_order_id where cod.t_merchant_number = #{merchantNumber}
mapper.update: update codeworld_order set t_order_delivery_company = #{orderDeliveryCompany}, t_order_delivery_sn = #{orderDeliverySn}, t_order_delivery_number = #{orderDeliveryNumber} where t_order_id = #{id}
